page.title: 10SHEERNESS: LOCAL NEWS 2
page.content: THE OTHER MAIN NEWS STORY THIS SUMMER IS ABOUT PROBLEMS WITH THE{A249 THE ONLY ROAD LINK ONTO THE ISLAND. THERE ARE MAJOR ROADWORKS ON THE {A249}CAUSING LONG DELAYS AS IT HAS ONLY A SINGLE CARRIAGEWAY. MANY INDUSTRIES FEEL THAT IT IS WRONG TO ONLY HAVE ONE ROAD INTO SUCH AN IMPORTANT PORT AS{SHEERNESS. ABBOTS (A PHARMACEUTIAL COMPANY),{KLIPPONS (MANUFACTURERS OF OFFICE EQUIPMENT) {TOYOTA CARS, SHEERNESS STEEL}AND THE {OLAU LINE}HAVE THREATENED TO MOVE FROM {SHEERNESS}BECAUSE OF PROBLEMS WITH DELIVERIES AND STAFF GETTING INTO WORK ON TIME. THE{OLAU LINE}FIGURES FOR 1984 FOR TRAFFIC AND FERRY ACTIVITY SHOW THAT 52,000 HEAVY GOOD VEHICLES,112,000 PRIVATE CARS 5,500 COACHES AND 10,000 CAR TRANSPORTERS CARRYING 65,000 NEW CARS USED THE{A249.
